title: Sigma E35 - Tapered Blending
description:
Unique Feature: Longer, slightly firm bristles
Function: Controlled application of crease color
Recommended Use: Using just the tip of the brush to pick up color, apply product directly onto the crease and sweep through. Effect is blended, but defined.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma E40 - Tapered Blending
description:
Unique Feature: Very tapered and pointed with precise tip
Function: Precise color application onto the crease
Recommended Use: Picking up color with just the tip of the brush, apply intense colors to the crease to add depth and dimension to the eye.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma F10 - Powder/Blush
description:
Unique Feature: Very soft and slightly beveled
Function: Precise placement of blush
Recommended Use: Use for powder application.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma F20 - Large Powder
description:
Unique Feature: Very soft and extra-large flat head
Function: Controlled bronzer application
Recommended Use: Bronzing of the cheekbones and temple area. Using the flat side gives definition and control. Bristle Type: Natural

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma Sigmax® Essential Kit 10 Brushes
description:
The Sigma Beauty Sigmax Essential Kit contains ten brushes specially designed for a high definition, flawless makeup application. The brushes in this kit feature exclusive Sigmax fibers, uniquely designed to apply powder, cream and liquid products without absorption into the bristles. The Sigmax Essential Kit has everything you need to achieve a perfect and flawless face.

Brushes Included:

F80 - Flat KabukiTM: Application of liquid or cream products to flat areas of the face such as the forehead and cheeks.
F82 - Round KabukiTM: Blend mineral products onto the skin.
F84 - Angled KabukiTM: Buff cream blush or bronzer onto the skin.
F88 - Flat Angled KabukiTM: Blends foundation easily onto hard to reach areas of the face. Angle fits all areas of the face seamlessly. Works especially well on cheekbones and contours of the nose.
F86 - Tapered KabukiTM: Apply cream and liquid foundations onto the harder to reach contours of the face.
P80 - Precision FlatTM: Stipple concealer on sun spots, blemishes, and other small imperfections.
P82 - Precision RoundTM: Apply eye shadow base or primer onto the lid.
P84 - Precision AngledTM: Apply product to areas such as the sides of the nose and the hollows of the cheeks.
P86 - Precision TaperedTM: Exact placement of concealer in harder to reach areas such as around the eyes and nose, chin, and around the mouth.
P88 - Precision Flat AngledTM: Use for precise application of concealer products anywhere on the face. Works particularly well around the eyes and nose.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: NARS Sheer Glow Foundation, Deauville
description: A glowing, satin-finish foundation with sheer and buildable coverage. Replete with skincare benefits and the NARS Complexion Brightening Formula, skin is hydrated, more luminous, softer and smoother. Used daily, Sheer Glow Foundation improves skin brightness, radiance and texture. For normal to dry skin types.

title: BeautyBlender Black Make Up Sponge Applicator - Duo
description: Buy beautyblender Makeup Sponges & Puffs - BeautyBlender Black Make Up Sponge Applicator - Duo. How-to-Use: Blend your way to a flawless face! Seeing make up is the first sign of an amateur application. Beautyblender was created without edges in order to eliminate visible lines and streaks.
